document.full_text: tennessee athletics director mike hamilton announced tuesday he decided to resign so the volunteers would have a "clean slate" when they go before the ncaa's committee on infractions later in the week.
document.title: tennessee athletic director mike hamilton announces resignation
lines_and_colors: tennessee athletics director mike hamilton announced tuesday he decided to resign so the volunteers would have a "clean slate" when they go before the ncaa's committee on infractions later in the week.
